This work was inspired by Ji Lee. I liked so much the game that I decided to try it too, with italian words (for example the first three are: whale, jellyfish and dragonfly). Be careful, this game is really addictive, you will not sleep the night anymore ;P

Many thanks to Anna
for comments and ideas!
